Package dukechatbot.utility

Class TaskList

  • java.lang.Object
    • dukechatbot.utility.TaskList
  • public class TaskList
extends java.lang.Object
    The TaskList implements the operations and attributes needed to handle manipulation of the task list.

    • Constructor Summary

      TaskList​(java.util.ArrayList<Task> tl)
      Constructs the instance of Task List with its associated array list.

      • delete

        public void delete​(java.lang.Integer id,
                   Ui ui)
        Deletes the task from the array list associated with this instance of TaskList.
        Parameters:
        id - the id passed in to obtain the actual task number to be deleted.
        ui - the instance of Ui to allow for printing out of the success of delete to user.

      • mark

        public void mark​(int id,
                 Ui ui)
        Marks the task specified as done.
        Parameters:
        id - the id passed in to obtain the actual task number to be marked done.
        ui - the instance of Ui to allow for printing out of the success of marking the task as done to user.

      • unmark

        public void unmark​(int id,
                   Ui ui)
        Marks the task as not done.
        Parameters:
        id - the id passed in to obtain the actual task number to be marked as not done.
        ui - the instance of Ui to allow for printing out of the success of marking the task as not done to user.

      • find

        public void find​(java.lang.String desc,
                 Ui ui)
        Finds the tasks in the array list that contains the description passed in.
        Parameters:
        desc - the keywords that will specify which tasks to be found and shown.
        ui - the instance of Ui to allow for printing of the tasks that are found.
